modName: Aoki revealing robes and skirts for males non replacer
summary: male Monk, Necromancer and Warlock robes into skirts, made by aoki. Non replacer version.
descriptionHtml:
[size=3][i]You want your mage Dovakin and his followers to be sexy, but you don\'t want every monk in the game to be half naked in the cold ? This mod is designed for you ![/i][/size]

[color=red][size=5]UPDATES[/size]

[list][*]v4 : added light and lighter versions of the college robes (by aoki)
[*]added optional [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1749261]luddemann[/url]\'s textures
[*]v3 : Corrected the texture path and added 4 skirts (vaermina and blue, long and short)
[*]v2 : Fixed the bug with monk skirts showing long sleeves in first person view
[/list][/color]
[color=red][size=5]DESCRIPTION[/size][/color]

male Monk, Necromancer and Warlock robes into skirts, made by aoki. It also includes monk\'s hoods (I separated it from the robes so you can use whatever monk\'s hood with whatever cloth or armor > see screenshots). Non replacer version.

Monks, necromancers and warlocks skirts are available in every sizes (non revealing, revealing long and revealing short) at the [url=www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Radiant_Raiment]Radiant Raiment[/url] in Solitude. The vendor name is Solafein.

College mage robes are available at the Winterhold College (the NPC should be on the second floor or the [url=http://www.uesp.net/wiki/Skyrim:Hall_of_Attainment]Hall of Attainment[/url]). The vendor\'s name is Martin Light.

By default, the NPC will NOT be affected.

These files contain adult-only content!

[color=red][size=5]REQUIREMENTS[/size][/color]

It was design for Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male v1.5 or higher by Sundracon, but I use it with Favored Soul male nude and it works fine.

[color=red][size=5]OPTIONAL FILES[/size][/color]

[center][IMG]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/images/35862-1-1368288778.png[/IMG][/center]
[list][*]installation : install the main file, and then overwrite with these textures
[*]all the monk\'s, necromancer\'s and warlock\'s robes will be affected (the default ones and the long and short skirts)
[/list]
[color=red][size=5]RECOMMENDED MODS[/size][/color]

I recommand to use it with other cloths parts :
* capes, for example the excellent [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/13486//?]Winter is Coming[/url]
* mantel of [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/29469/]the well dressed mage[/url]
* [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17401//?]Grimoa\'s scarf and gugel[/url]

Other good skirt mod for males :
* For fighters : [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4793//?]Conan the barbarian outfits[/url]

[color=red][size=5]CREDITS[/size][/color]

[list][*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/11806/?]original mod by aoki[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/19956//?]luddemann\'s textures[/url] (partially revised to work with aoki\'s mod)
[*]Bethesda Softworks
[*]Nifskope
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/62287/?]AlienSlof for \'family jewels\' (New Vegas Import)[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3243376/?]jajajajaja for Figleaf Male mesh[/url] 
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/1630086/?]Sundracon for Nude Male with Import from Roberts new vegas male[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2451997/?]MysticBinary82 for hairy body skin used on pictures[/url]
[*][url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/30377/?]Geonox for high res face maps used on pictures[/url]
[/list]
[color=red][size=5]PERMISSIONS[/size][/color]

Ask Aoki, because he did almost all meshes and textures the work.
author: Aoki
